### Government Tender Announcement

#### Support Services in support of Naval Operations Support Solutions (NOSS)

**Tender Reference:** WS3655111266-Doc3655287117

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested vendors to submit their bids for the provision of Informatics professional services in support of the Naval Operations Support Solutions (NOSS). This requirement is intended to provide support through the C2IS requirements for Her Majesty’s Canadian Ships (HMCS) and coastal formations and Fleet commands.

#### Key Information

* **Tender Title:** W8482-229009 Support Services in support of the Naval Operations Support Solutions (NOSS)
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-07T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-03
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Eligibility Criteria

* Vendors must hold a Tier 2 status under the TBIPS SA and be registered in all required resource categories in the National Capital Region (NCR) under the EN578-170432 series of SAs.
* Vendors must submit their bids in compliance with the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 7, 2022, at 14:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this deadline will be declared non-responsive.
* This requirement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

#### Contact Information

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada
* Phone number: None
* Email address: josee.st-onge@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
